document.full_text: germany plans to shut all nuclear reactors by 2022, chancellor angela merkel's ruling coalition announced on monday, in a policy reversal drawn up in a rush after the fukushima disaster in japan.
document.title: german government wants nuclear exit by 2022 at latest
lines_and_colors: germany plans to shut all nuclear reactors by 2022, chancellor angela merkel's ruling coalition announced on monday, in a policy reversal drawn up in a rush after the fukushima disaster in japan.
